title: BBC Local Live: Norfolk on Thursday, 21 January 2016 - BBC News
summary: german u-boat discovered off norfolk coast .
lifesaver calls for more basic first aid training .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's it from the norfolk live team today , we 'll return tomorrow at 08:00 .
do n't forget to get in touch if you have a story or a photograph that you 'd like to share with us .
you can contact us via email , on facebook or twitter .
have a good evening .
author: BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: pub 's music licence restricted
text: the landlord of a north norfolk pub says he feels he 's been unfairly treated after his music licence was restricted by councillors .
dennis gilligan , who runs the white lady in worstead , has been told he can also only play music outdoors at four weddings a year .
people living nearby had complained about the noise .
author: Nicky Price
BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: weather : cloudy with light rain overnight
text: increasingly cloudy with light patchy rain tonight and feeling chilly as temperatures fall to 1 ( c ) ( 34f ) .
friday will be a cloudy and windy day , with outbreaks of rain , heavy in places , though this will gradually clear through the afternoon .
maximum temperature : 11 ( c ) ( 52f ) .
there 's further information available from bbc weather .
author: Dan Holley
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: harry toffolo joins peterborough on-loan
text: norwich city left-back harry toffolo has joined league one side peterborough united for the rest of the season .
the 20-year-old , who has made one first-team appearance for the canaries , played seven times on loan at rotherham earlier this term .
he also spent much of last season on loan at swindon town , appearing 30 times for posh 's league one rivals .
author: Phil Daley
BBC Radio Norfolk sport

documents.title: the headlines : german u-boat discovered off norfolk coast firefighters tackle 3m-long jet of flame
text: the stories in the news today :
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: first world war submarine discovered on seabed
text: the wreck of a german submarine , lost for more than 100 years , was uncovered on a seabed 90kms ( 55 miles ) off the norfolk coast .
engineers working on a wind farm project discovered the u-boat lying on the seabed at a depth of 98ft ( 30m ) .
the find was made in 2012 , but the vessel has only now been officially identified .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rebecca field misses out at world bowls championships
text: norwich 's rebecca field has lost out in the ladies singles final at the world indoor bowls championships at potters in hopton-on-sea .
the 2013 world champion was beaten in two sets by cambridge 's ellen falkner .
both sets were won by just a single shot .
author: Phil Daley
BBC Radio Norfolk sport

documents.title: ryan is ready to take on the world
text: the back page of today 's norwich evening news :
author: Norwich Evening News

documents.title: watch : queen arrives at wi for afternoon tea
text: here 's the queen arriving for tea and cakes with the women 's institute at sandringham today .
each year , she visits wi members at west newton village hall as part of her winter stay on the norfolk estate .
the monarch became a member of the sandringham wi in 1943 .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: better gcse results for norfolk 's pupils
text: the latest school league tables show the average number of children in a norfolk school getting five a to c gcses has gone up to 54.9 % , from 52.7 % .
the best-performing school was wymondham college , where 87 % of pupils got the grades .
several schools failed to hit the minimum score of 40 % , expected by the government .
these include wayland academy , ormiston victory academy , great yarmouth va high school , city academy and the hewett academy .
author: Paul Moseley
BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: criminal charges over fire deaths ?
text: the front page of today 's norwich evening news :
author: Norwich Evening News

documents.title: watch : house badly damaged after fire crews tackle 3m-long jet of flame
text: firefighters called to a blaze in a gorleston terraced house last night had to tackle a 3m-long jet of flame .
the gas main within the house had fractured , the first time that fire station manager john wilby had known this to happen .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: glassmakers ' stock to be sold next week
text: the remaining stock at caithness crystal in king 's lynn will be sold off next week , with the fittings and equipment going in an online sale next month .
the glass-making company has announced its closure , saying it 's struggled since the recession .
it says it can no longer meet its overheads , citing a change in customer buying habits with more people using the internet to shop .
changes to the hardwick roundabout have led to fewer people dropping into the centre .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: medical centre rated 'outstanding '
text: a gp surgery in east norfolk has been rated `` oustanding '' following an inspection by the care quality commission .
the park surgery , in great yarmouth , provides general medical services to 10,600 patients in the area , including gorleston and bradwell .
the inspection , in november , found the practice met the needs of the people it served , providing an `` innovative , caring effective and well-led service '' .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: german submarine discovery 'a surprise '
text: engineers working on a wind farm project off the norfolk coast have discovered the wreck of a german u-boat , more than 100 years since it sank with the loss of its entire crew .
the scanning team were expecting to see wrecks , but such a discovery was quite a surprise and has been extremely interesting . ''
the 57.6m-long ( 63yds ) wreck is described as being in `` remarkable condition '' , with damage found at the bow and stern , suggesting its original length could have been slightly longer .

documents.title: city on to a winner
text: the back page of today 's eastern daily press :
author: Eastern Daily Press

documents.title: u-boat find : entire crew of submarine lost their lives off norfolk coast
text: four officers and 31 men were lost when a world war one u-boat , from the imperial german navy , sank off the norfolk coast more than 100 years ago .
the submarine , discovered in 2012 by engineers working on a wind farm project , has only now been officially identified .

relatives and descendants of those lost in the u-31 can now take comfort in knowing the final resting place of the crew the discovery serves as a poignant reminder of all those lost at sea , on land and in the air during the first world war . ''
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: disruption to main line rail services
text: abellio greater anglia is warning of some disruption to rail services between norwich and liverpool street , due to urgent track repairs near london .
author: BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: u-boat believed to have struck a mine
text: the german submarine found lying on the seabed 90km ( 60 miles ) east of the norfolk coast was commissioned into the imperial german navy in september 1914 .
in january 1915 , the sm u-31 slipped its mooring , sailing north-west from wilhelmshaven for a routine patrol , and disappeared..
it 's thought the submarine had struck a mine , sinking with the loss of its entire crew .
the wreck , discovered by engineers working on a wind farm project , is 57.6m ( 63yds ) long , 4.1m ( 4.5yds ) wide , and 4.6m ( 5yds ) high .
the bow appears to be facing south , experts said .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: wreck of german u-boat discovered off norfolk coast
text: a german u-boat lost for more than a century has been uncovered on the seabed off the norfolk coast .
engineers working on a wind farm project unearthed the wreck , lying about 90km ( 60 miles ) east of caister-on-sea .
mark dunkley , marine archaeologist at historic england says the submarine is in `` remarkable condition , with the conning tower present and the bows partially buried . ''
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: norwich the coldest place in the frozen east
text: frost and freezing fog was the scene across norfolk this morning , and weather forecaster dan holley confirms that norwich was the coldest place in east anglia .
e anglia min temps : norwich top of the table with -5.6c , but coldest night since apr 2013 for shoebury + charsfield :
author: BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: costs of payouts revealed
text: the front page of today 's eastern daily press :
author: Eastern Daily Press

documents.title: gorleston fire : fire crews did all they could
text: i 've been speaking to people who live in daphne way , gorleston , this morning , and they 've been telling me about the fire last night , when firefighters spent several hours containing a 3m ( 8.4ft ) flaming gas jet .
carol barber , who looked after a neighbour , said it was very scary but the firefighters were doing all they could .
they could n't do any more until the gas people got here they were the only people who could cap the gas off without any danger . ''
author: Andrew Turner
BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: neighbour helps save life of four-week-old baby
text: a woman who helped save the life of her neighbour 's four-week-old baby is urging people to learn basic first aid skills .
emily white , of foulsham , seen here with her own child , performed cpr on tina westlake 's son kane , after he stopped breathing from choking on milk .
emily said her `` instinct kicked in .
i started rescue breaths and cpr , and called for an ambulance '' .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : some sunshine
text: after a frosty and foggy start , there 'll be some sunshine but cloud will build later .
maximum temperature : 6c ( 43f ) .
outbreaks of rain tonight , and not as cold as recently .
minimum temperature : 2c ( 36f ) .
there 's more information on bbc weather .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: three-vehicle accident closes a47
text: emergency services are on the scene of a three-vehicle accident on the a47 at east winch .
the lynn road is blocked in both directions near to the junction with hall farm .
traffic is queueing in both directions .
it 's not known if anyone has been injured .
author: Tim Addicott
BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: fighting gorleston house fire 'was very difficult '
text: the fire station manager called to the scene of a fire in a terraced house in gorleston last night says it was one of the most complicated he 's ever had to fight .
john wilby says crews quickly realised a gas main within the house had fractured , and firefighters had to contain a 3m ( 8.4ft ) flaming gas jet .
trying to contain a fire like that and stop it spreading for two- and-a-half hours until it could be isolated was very difficult . ''
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fire forces families to evacuate their homes
text: a number of families were evacuated from their homes in gorleston last night after a fire in a row of terraced houses .
five fire crews spent three hours fighting the blaze in daphne way , which broke out at 18:00 .
station manager john wilby of norfolk fire and rescue service said it was a complicated fire to fight , as they discovered that a gas main inside the house had fractured and caught fire .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: the headlines : fire forces families to leave their homes plea for all to learn basic first aid

author: BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: welcome to norfolk live
text: hello and thanks for joining us for thursday 's norfolk live , where the team will keep you up to date with news , sport , travel and weather from around the county .
is there something happening in your part of norfolk that you think we should know about , or maybe you have some photographs that you 'd like to share ? .
you can contact us on email , facebook or twitter .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live
